conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D and navigate through baffles to reach containers E or F.

The baffles in the middle section include a red slanted baffle, a green slanted baffle, a grey slanted baffle, a pink slanted baffle, a white slanted baffle, and a black slanted baffle.
The containers E and F are positioned at the bottom of the system, with E on the left and F on the right.
The liquid from A is yellow, from B is turquoise, from C is pink, and from D is blue.

conclusion: Liquid from A flows downward and interacts with the red baffle, which deflects it to the right.

conclusion: Liquid from B flows downward and interacts with the red baffle, which deflects it to the right.
